spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5.3 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,332 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Treads of the Greatlynx

sockets.display_string: Hop onto a plank of wood with a haphazard shadowflame rocket attachment. Absolutely nothing could go wrong, but if it did, deal 598,009 Shadowflame damage split between you and enemies caught in the theoretical blast.

spells.description: Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.5 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,194 Haste for 12 sec.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 9.6 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 848,406 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)
